author: Mark Jones
title: Liverpool v Tottenham quiz! Name the 13 men who played for both the Reds and Spurs in the Premier League
text:
Sport Liverpool v Tottenham quiz! Name the 13 men who played for both the Reds and Spurs in the Premier League Two of the Premier League's ever-presents clash at Anfield on Saturday, but can you remember all of the players they've shared since 1992? Share Crouchie's in, but who else have you got in your locker? (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Liverpool's clash with Tottenham at Anfield on Saturday is looking like a key moment in both clubs' seasons. 
With the Reds' campaign having gone off the rails in recent weeks, Jurgen Klopp's side will be desperate for a win to kickstart things, while Mauricio Pochettino's Spurs still have lofty ambitions themselves, and those will include a win on Merseyside. 
And to get you in the mood for the game, we thought we'd give you a little test. No, neither of these two are in there (Photo: Getty) 
Because THIRTEEN players have represented both Liverpool and Spurs in the Premier League era, and we want you to name them all. 
There's a pretty big (and tall) clue to the identity of one of them in the picture at the top of the page, but how many of the others can you get? 
You've got four minutes, and remember to tweet us your scores to @MirrorRowZed . 
GO!
